verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Many valleys ahead to walk through
Many mountains and hills to be climbed.
Through the darkness I cry
For the help of the Most High.
I need Thy strength, I need Thy life to see me through.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Through the tests, through the trials,
Through every dark mile, in the depths of despair,
I the Lord am always there, and in the valley be still
And wait, for I shall fill thee
With new strength and new courage to press on all the way.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Many shakings ahead to stand through,
Many testings and trials to endure.
And though some fall away, O Lord keep me in Thy way.
I need Thy strength, I need Thy life to see me through.
